name: 10th International Conference on Software Engineering
content: 10th International Conference on Software Engineering (SOFE 2024) February 24 \~ 25, 2024, Vancouver, Canada https://acsty2024.org/sofe/index Scope 10th International Conference on Software Engineering (SOFE 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Software Engineering. The goal of this Conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Modern software engineering concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to the Conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of software engineering & applications. Topics of Interest • Advanced Topics in Software Engineering • Knowledge-based Systems and Formal Methods • Languages and Formal Methods • Managing Software Projects • Multimedia and Visual Software Engineering • Quality Management • Search Engines and Information Retrieval • Software Engineering Decision Making • Software Engineering Practice • Software Maintenance and Testing • Software Process • Web Engineering • Web-based Education Systems and Learning Applications • Emerging Practices in Software Process & Architecture • Devops Models, Practices, Challenges • Lean & Agile software Development & practices • Software as a Service (Saas) Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 03, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from SOFE 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • International Journal of Software Engineering & Applications (IJSEA) - ERA Indexed • Computer Science & Engineering: An International Journal (CSEIJ) • Advanced Computing: An International Journal (ACIJ) • Information Technology in Industry (ITII) Important Dates • Submission Deadline: February 03, 2024 • Authors Notification: February 13, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due: February 17, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: sofe@acsty2024.org or sofeaconf@yahoo.com Submission URL: https://acsty2024.org/submission/index.php
